name: restic
description: Restic is a secure, fast, self-hosted backup client. It supports encryption, deduplication, multiple backends, and CLI operations for efficient backup and restore workflows.

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Protect data with AES-256 encryption before uploading to storage

features.title: Deduplication
features.description: Save storage space by identifying and storing only unique data blocks

features.title: Multiple Backends
features.description: Back up to local disks, SFTP, S3, Azure, Google Cloud, and more

features.title: Incremental Backups
features.description: Transfer only changed data to minimize backup time and bandwidth

features.title: Snapshot Management
features.description: Create point-in-time snapshots and restore to any previous state

features.title: Compression
features.description: Reduce backup size with built-in compression algorithms

features.title: Verification
features.description: Check backup integrity with cryptographic hashes to detect corruption

features.title: Selective Restore
features.description: Recover individual files or directories without restoring entire backups
